00028 typedef struct g2t_vertex_st {
00029         char ge_volume[4]; /* GEANT volume name */
00030         int daughter_p; /* Id of first daughter in linked list */
00031         int eg_label; /* generator label (or 0 if GEANT vertex) */
00032         int eg_proc; /* generator production mechanism (if any) */
00033         int event_p; /* pointer to event */
00034         int ge_medium; /* GEANT Medium */
00035         int ge_proc; /* >0 GEANT, =0 event generator */
00036         int id; /* primary key */
00037         int is_itrmd; /* flags intermediate vertex */
00038         int n_daughter; /* Number of daughter tracks */
00039         int n_parent; /* number of parent tracks */
00040         int next_itrmd_p; /* Id of next intermedate vertex */
00041         int next_prim_v_p; /* Id of next primary vertex */
00042         int parent_p; /* Id of first parent track */
00043         float eg_tof; /* generator vertex production time */
00044         float eg_x[3]; /* generator vertex coordinate (Cartesian) */
00045         float ge_tof; /* GEANT vertex production time */
00046         float ge_x[3]; /* GEANT vertex coordinate (Cartesian) */
00047 } G2T_VERTEX_ST;
00048 #endif /* G2T_VERTEX_H */
